definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Marco Polo (1254-c. 1324), Venetian trader and explorer who traveled the Silk road to China, author of Il Milione (Travels of Marco Polo)
prajña paramita (Sanskrit: supreme wisdom - beginning of the Heart Sutra)

pinyin: bo1 re3 bo1 luo2 mi4 duo1 xin1 jing1

definition: the Apollo project (1961-1975), the NASA moon landing project

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先进航空学将会改变阿波罗和舰载机的加速器颜色。

sentences.english: Appollo stood for youth and manly beauty.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗象征着青春和阳刚之美。

sentences.english: The dreaded wood-eating shipworm is invading northern Europe's Baltic Sea.
sentences.chinese: 可怕的吃木头的船蛆正在侵袭北欧的波罗的海。
阿波罗的第一个情人是黛芙妮。

sentences.english: If you are Dafne, I'm your Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是达芙妮，我就是你的阿波罗。

sentences.english: He shot Apollo with a golden arrow through the heart, causing him to fall madly in love with Daphne.
sentences.chinese: 穿过阿波罗心脏的是金箭，使他疯狂地爱上了达佛涅。

sentences.english: When Bodhisattva Avalokiteshvara was practicing the profound Prajna Paramita, he illuminated the Five Skandhas and saw that they are all empty.
sentences.chinese: 观自在菩萨行甚深般若波罗蜜多时，照见五蕴皆空。

sentences.english: Scene changed to Ishida and Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 场面转到雨龙和阿波罗。

sentences.english: In this city is one of the most revered temples, that of Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗神庙是这座城市里最受敬仰的神庙之一。

sentences.english: "Daphne" is a nymph who metamorphosed into a laurel tree as a means of escaping from Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 达芙妮就是为逃避阿波罗而变成一颗月桂树的女神。

sentences.english: A long time ago, Apollo was the god of light.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，阿波罗是太阳神，伊洛斯是爱神。

sentences.english: The god Apollo, however, knew of Achilles’ weak spot and told Paris about it.
sentences.chinese: 然而阿波罗神却知道阿奇里斯的弱点并告诉了帕里斯。

sentences.english: With each passing day, you will possess the merits of the six paramitas.
sentences.chinese: 是人日日得具六波罗蜜圆满功德。

sentences.english: The 5th century BC Doric Temple of Apollo at the site of Ancient Corinth.
sentences.chinese: 公元前5世纪多利安寺在古代科林斯网站阿波罗。

sentences.english: Baltic Birch enclosure with Polyurea coating.
sentences.chinese: 波罗的海桦木箱体，聚脲涂料。

definition: Manes (3rd century AD), Persian prophet and founder of Manichaeism
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
